title: ininvalid novalise or scale argument
body:
## Environment Information

|Module|Version|
|-|-|
|`Video2X`|2.1.0|
|`FFmpeg`|ffmpeg-latest-win64-static|
|`waifu2x-caffe`||
|`waifu2x-converter-cpp`||
|`waifu2x-ncnn-vulkan`|20190712|

## Symptom

I received different error messages when trying to convert versions of the video with codecs video2x_gui.exe didn't support, so I tried it with an h264 avi, which I knew it would support, but it gave me this error message block instead. I used the NCNN Driver, the CUDNN Method (which my computer does support and have installed), 2 Threads, Scale Ratio 6 on a 320p video, and Format PNG. I checked the folder; the frames were extracted just fine, but the upscaler gets stuck on 0%.

## Screenshots or Error Messages

